article.title: Harris Award To Provide Manpack Radio Systems for Deployed Forces
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Harris Corporation has received a $7.6 million order from the U.S. Defense Department for its Falcon III AN/PRC-117G multiband manpack radio systems. The Defense Department is acquiring the radios to provide deployed forces with expanded wireless tactical communications capabilities such as video, e-mail and collaborative chat.
